title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Does Scott die in stunt week devastation?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Fans were left devastated during last night’s episode of Hollyoaks, as chaos and devastation ensued in the village, and several of the soap’s mainstays were left fighting for their lives as a result. Among those caught up in disaster were Scott Drinkwell (Ross Adams) and Mitchell Devereaux (Imran Adams), and tonight, viewers saw the pair freed from the wreckage. However, things weren’t looking too good for Scott as the episode came to an end — but will he die as a result of the injuries he sustained?

Last night, Scott and Mitchell secretly entered the florists — unaware of the devastation that was occurring elsewhere in the village. However, they soon learned of what was transpiring when they saw emergency services pass by. In an attempt to get to safety, Scott and Mitchell headed for the door — but they were horrified to find that it was jammed shut.

Not long afterwards, disaster struck, as the crane collapsed, and both Scott and Mitchell found themselves buried under rubble in the florist. Fans were left wondering what fate was in store for the two characters, and tonight, the pair remained unconscious under the collapsed ceiling.

Eventually, Cleo (Nadine Mulkerrin) spotted Scott and tried to get help — but she was horrified to realise that Mitchell was also trapped in there as well. Eventually, they were pulled free and taken to the hospital.

However, it’s clear that Scott is not out of the woods just yet, as he remained in a critical condition by the episode’s end.

Will he die as a result of the injuries he sustained in the devastation? It’s certainly a possibility, as he was left in a pretty bad way, and sustained quite a lot of injuries as a result.

What’s more, will Cleo discover the truth about why Mitchell was in the florists alone with Scott in the first place?

Tomorrow’s instalment of Hollyoaks is a three-hander featuring Cleo, Mitchell and Scott — so there’s a large possibility that the whole truth will come to light.

With actress Nadine on maternity leave, Cleo is set to depart the village — so should Scott and Mitchell’s dalliance be revealed, this could be the very reason why she takes some time away from her home.

Hollyoaks continues Thursday 31stOctober at 7pm on E4.
